rules.text: Please do not request personal accounts. Only accounts dedicated to apps!
Please setup a verified link to your app's website in each account on indieapps.space.
Do not use your account for information unrelated to your app.
Use your app account only for news, announcements, tips, and user support (through unlisted or direct messages) for your app.
Only apply for account for apps developed by independent individuals or small teams.
